_sText:
This is the sixth public release of this map

RC1 Changelog:

MAJOR BALANCE+GAMEPLAY FIXES

- improved defense-zones in lab, oilrig and church

- human can complete the defense in church and then escape without a hurry

- added gate on oilrig (probably temporary fix)

- further fps + ping fixes

- some new textures

- better lights in some areas

- Ad Banner for Dreist Multigaming Clan

Escape from Hell! 
- Jump down the rocks and get to one of the graves 

- Pass the Bridge and the Gate of Death and defend the research lab 

- Get beamed up onto the surface and swim to the oilrig 

- Defend it and wait for the chopper 2 take u to the holy church! 

- Defend the 2nd Level of the church from the Zombies 

- and escape to the roof to survive the upcoming apocalypse!
